DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate that Lidocaine-Prilocaine cream decrease pain during hysterosalpingography diagnostic practice.
DOC.brief_title: Lidocaine-Prilocaine (EMLA) Cream as Analgesia in Hysterosalpingography Practice
DOC.criteria: patients that must perform a hysterosalpingography acceptance to participate in the study signed informed consent hypersensitivity or allergy to anesthetics refusal of the patient patients under age 18 years old and pregnant unbearable pain that involves other analgesic measures
